title: Clover Health, Palantir, Coupang: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Occasional meme stock Clover Health was soaring premarket after its earnings report
body:
Stock futures wavered after data showed new applications for jobless benefits, a proxy for layoffs, fell last week. Here’s what we’re watching before the opening bell.
Join Our Summer Stock-Picking Contest: Test your investing savvy against our Heard on the Street writers to predict the best-performing stock for the rest of 2021.
